body: @s04ma  I can‘t see the reason why you complain about this translation group. If they finished the translation of all chapters, I just need to favorite one final version. Fair enough for me. So stop barking under every their translation works.
@s04ma shut up, no one cares about it

OMG can u please stop to repost the 拾荒者translated yaoi manga when you reupload them in a messy way？？ When the same manga have a new chapter, you reupload all of the chapter including the  old chapters again in every post. You waste the storage of this website and makes the readers feel UNCOMFORTABLE！Stop your reupload please！﻿﻿﻿
你不要再重覆上傳了好嗎？？盜傳也傳得像屎一樣，雜亂無章。亂得一塌糊塗讓我懷疑你腦子是不是有病，根本就在擾亂已經很混亂的搜尋系統和規避過的關鍵詞設定，停下好嗎！！！﻿
